Question1: I have asked for an education or training that would help me do my job better?

Question2: Every time when I ask for training, I get it?

Question3: I have all the tools that I need to do my job successfully?

Question4: I always get constructive feedback about my work?

Question5: I always know when changes, that affect my job, are conducted?

Question6: I think my work is appreciated?

Question7: I think I get the right amount of money and benefits for the work I do?

Question8: I think the company, cares about me as an employee?

Question9: I think i have correct attitude to work in company?

Question10: I think i can handle pressure situations?
